title: Procurement for the supply of 160,000 Pre-filled Syringes of Enoxaparin 	Sodium Injection, 4,000 IU in  0.4ml
decision_details:
-The Cabinet, at its meeting held on 2020‑01‑08 granted approval to award the contract for the procurement of Pre-filled Syringes of Enoxaparin Sodium Injection used for the treatment of patients with heart diseases to M/s ABC Pharma Services (Pvt) Ltd. Accordingly, the relevant order has been issued to the supplier on 2020‑02‑24.

	However, it was later confirmed that there is a need for another 160,000 	syringes of the same drug. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of 	Health to award the procurement for the supply of 160,000 Pre-filled Syringes 	of Enoxaparin Sodium Injection 4,000 IU in 0.4ml to the same supplier, M/s 	ABC Pharna Services (Pvt) Ltd. as a repeat order at a sum of Rs. 126.96 	million as recommended by the  Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement 	Committee, 	was approved by the Cabinet.
